reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 571/00: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES OF MINISTER
reg_info.reg_name_text: assignment of powers and duties of minister
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 571/00: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES OF MINISTER

content.content: 1. The Mining and Lands Tribunal is assigned the powers and duties of the Minister of Natural Resources for the purpose of hearing and determining appeals under subsection 28 (15) of the Conservation Authorities Act.  O. Reg. 571/00, s. 1; O. Reg. 469/17, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Mining and Lands Tribunal is assigned the powers and duties of the Minister of Natural Resources for the purpose of hearing and determining appeals under subsection 28 (15) of the Conservation Authorities Act.  O. Reg. 571/00, s. 1; O. Reg. 469/17, s. 1.
